text: The women's 4 × 50 metre freestyle relay competition of the 2018 FINA World Swimming Championships (25 m) was held on 16 December 2018. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable |- ! !! Nation !! Time !! Location !!
